thread.section_title: The Independent Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: When we return to Rome, we'll be back here
thread.title_full: When we return to Rome, we'll be back here - Review of The Independent Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Tom1503
title: When we return to Rome, we'll be back here
text:
Excellent facilities
Very clean hotel
Great location right by Termini
All staff very helpful
Breakfast excellent and varied
Free upgrade a nice touch
Overall I couldn't rate our experience at The Independent Hotel highly enough. Each member of staff was superb.
